attributes.action: stop any more money being wasted on the plan for a West London Tram.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ken Livingstone is determined to force a tram down the narrow, congested Uxbridge Road despite a public consultation rejecting this folly.
All three councils on the route now oppose the plan. It is time that this waste of public money be stopped. Millions of pounds have already been wasted.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop any more money being wasted on the plan for a West London Tram."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11213.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/West-LondonTram/
